item.title: Regional Blackout EP 5. - NATE BAILEY - Sun, June 8
item.description:
Thrills, spills, kills!
Nate Bailey joined Matt because Evan Wansy was away. Jenna Slade from Tender Hearts (and Matt's new wife) in as studio guest. One phone call only. Summer is hard on the old phone lines. Played some Mean Jeans, Ballantynes, Ramones, Mac DeMarco, and more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Nate Bailey cohosts as Evan was away. Tender Hearts' Jenna Slade in studio.

item.title: Regional Blackout EP 2 - Allie Sheldan - Sun, June 15
item.description: FATHERS DAY SPECIAL! Matt and Evan play host to Allie Sheldan from LEGS who joins them in studio. Another call from friend Nate Bailey (check him out on youtube.com). Good times abound. Songs from LEGS, the Flintettes, Live Meat, Bruce Springsteen, and of course, QUEEN!
item.itunes:subtitle: guest Allie Sheldan from LEGS

item.title: Regional Blackout EP 1. - Sun, June 8
item.description: First ever episode! Matt and Evan stumble and fumble and finally get running on Regional Blackout. In studio guest - Macey Budgell of Needles//Pins and Budgies Burritos. A call from Nate Bailey!
item.itunes:subtitle: guest Macey Budgell from Needles//Pins
